item.description:
15th Annual Empty Bowls Project
October 27 from 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM

On Saturday, October 27th, Manchester Community College (MCC) will once again host the Annual Empty Bowls Project in support of Foodshare. Now in its 15th year, Empty Bowls is a fun and filling way to give to Foodshare and bring home some hand-crafted pottery. At the MCC culinary center you can make a suggested donation to Foodshare, pick out a bowl crafted by local potters and MCC art students, and fill it (as many times as you’d like!) with soup from local restaurants and MCC’s amazing student chefs. From 10:00 am – 3:00 pm, the Manchester Art Association Craft Fair will also be taking place featuring many talented, local artists and crafters. Stop by, enjoy a great lunch for a great cause, andget some holiday shopping done as well!
item.name: Empty Bowls Event - Fundraiser for Foodshare
